mapper.select: SELECT * FROM weekly_totals ORDER BY week_label, stage
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO weekly_totals (week_label, stage, wafer_count, lot_count, order_count) VALUES (#{weekLabel}, #{stage}, #{waferCount}, #{lotCount}, #{orderCount})
mapper.update: MERGE INTO weekly_totals AS t USING (VALUES (#{weekLabel}, #{stage}, #{waferDelta}, #{lotDelta}, #{orderDelta})) AS s(wl, st, wd, ld, od) ON (t.week_label = s.wl AND t.stage = s.st) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET t.wafer_count = t.wafer_count + s.wd, t.lot_count = t.lot_count + s.ld, t.order_count = t.order_count + s.od WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES (s.wl, s.st, s.wd, s.ld, s.od)
